    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111256</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111256</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Štej po 1, 2, 3 ...</string>
            <string language="en">Count by 1,2,3...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zählimpuls durch 1.2.3...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compte par 1.2.3...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Contagem por 1.2.3...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conteggio da 1.2.3...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρίθμηση από 1.2.3...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuenta por 1.2.3...</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">POvezujemo pike in ustvarimo sličico. Štejemo po 1, 2, 3, 4 in 5.</string>
            <string language="en">Connecting the dots with line to create final image, but skip some dots.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pika</string>
            <string language="en">dot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">povezava</string>
            <string language="en">connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">risanje</string>
            <string language="en">drawing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">štetje</string>
            <string language="en">counting</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Punkte mit Zeile anschließen, um 
abschließendes Bild zu erstellen, aber einige Punkte zu 
überspringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reliant les points à la ligne pour créer l'image 
finale, mais pour sauter quelques points.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conectando os pontos com a linha para criar a 
imagem final, mas para saltar alguns pontos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegando i puntini con la riga per creare 
immagine finale, ma per saltare alcuni puntini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σύνδεση των σημείων με τη γραμμή για να δημιουργήσει
την τελική εικόνα, αλλά πηδά μερικά σημεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conectando los puntos con la línea para crear 
imagen final, sino para saltar algunos puntos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zählen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">connexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compte</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
